name: elevatorsaga
description: Elevator Saga =================== The elevator programming game

scripts.copy: cp -r libs/ build && cp -r font-awesome-4.1-1.0/ build && cp -r src/css/ build && cp src/js/base.js build && cp src/index.html build && cp src/documentation.html build
scripts.bundle: mkdir build && browserify src/js/app.js -o build/app.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run bundle && npm run copy
